post_message: Jessica Lange announced that four seasons of 'American Horror Story' was enough and she will not return.   The star of the first four seasons of 'American Horror Story', Jessica Lange, announced that she has no desire to return to the show. Lange will however return to FX in the show 'Feud'   One actress entering her fourth season of the show that announced she will be returning is Angela Bassett.
